drops.name: Steam battlestaff
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/701534460588720128|date=21 Feb 2016|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/rKg7V|archivedate=28 Mar 2019|quote=No, it's on K'ril only. 1/127.|name=steam bstaff}}

drops.name: Zamorakian spear
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1068484922061586437?s=19|date=30 Nov 2018|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/hGmQH|archivedate=29 Mar 2019|quote=It's 127 for both, actually. Loot tables commonly use 128, but there's no particular reason for that number, and the GWD dev appears to have preferred 127.|name=spear}}

drops.name: Staff of the dead
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/710459690090668032|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/RIxTT|archivedate=29 Mar 2019|quote=[does that mean SOTD/all other hilts are also 1/508?] Yeah, we kept them consistent.|date=17 Mar 2016|name=sotd}}

drops.name: Godsword shard 1
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group="d" name="sharddrop">The drop rate is 1/762 for a specific Godsword Shard piece, or 1/254 for any piece.</ref>{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/670676030022156288|date=28 Nov 2015|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/Q9d76|archivedate=26 Mar 2019|quote=There's a 1/254 chance of it deciding to give you a shard. So the chance of Shard 1 is 1/762, etc.|name=GS shard}}

drops.name: Super attack(3)
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group="d" name="supatkstr">Super attack and Super strength potions are always dropped together.</ref>

drops.name: Super restore(3)
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group="d" name="restbrew">Super restore potions and Zamorak brews are always dropped together.</ref>

drops.name: Coins
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group="d">Coins come from rolls on all loot tables, including the unique table, GDT and RDT.</ref>

drops.name: Brimstone key
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group="d">Only dropped if killed on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Konar quo Maten]].</ref>

drops.name: Pet k'ril tsutsaroth
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod JohnC|url=https://twitter.com/JagexJohnC/status/506398183178903552|date=1 Sep 2014|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/qulvf|archivedate=25 Mar 2019|quote=Godwars pet drop rates, all 4 are 1 in 5k. How (un)lucky have you been? Mole, KQ & KBD next week!}}
